about_the_game:
Railway Life is a charming slice-of-life adventure game where you travel around the idyllic countryside of a small British island on a little steam engine. Explore the old, disused railway lines at your own leisure and visit unique locations along the way.

Features
  • Real-time manual train driving – you can hop off the train anywhere along the line! (You could just run everywhere, but that would take a very, very long time)
  • Explore and find beautiful natural landscapes, along hidden trails or down winding paths
  • Interact with the island inhabitants and help them with tasks
  • Perform quests and tasks to expand and unlock new areas of the island
  • Craft wooden block models in your workshop for quests, or for your own decoration benefit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10(64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible sound card

short_description: Travel the forgotten railways on your little steam train in this charming slice-of-life adventure game, where you explore the fields, towns, mountains and beaches of a small British island and help turn it into a thriving community.
